Al-Jazeera is crucial because so many households in the Middle East turn to it in times of turmoil, said Dana Shell Smith, deputy assistant secretary for international media engagement, an office created last summer. If we are not in the conversation, people will be speaking for us or about us, said Shell Smith, who speaks Arabic. ''We need to make sure we are out there speaking for ourselves.'' Paid Clicks increased 18 percent for the company in the quarter, while cost-per click increased 4 percent. Google said that international revenues totaled$ 4.38 billion, 52 percent of total revenue for the quarter. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google. ''These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web.'' The

realize that they do face new increased risks from natural disaster. The New York Times contrasts the recent Australian floods with the Brazilian floods. Many fewer people died in the Australian Floods. Why? ''The hillside areas around Rio lacked early warning systems or effective community organizations that might have helped residents to wake one another as the rains intensified last Tuesday night, disaster experts and residents said. Most people are believed to have died early Wednesday morning as they slept, when water-loosened earth swept their houses away.''
